LanguageData.ATR_PartDecay.label: decaying part
LanguageData.ATR_PartDecay.description: This part of this unit has suffered significant decay and is performing suboptimally. Repairs are needed to alleviate this.
LanguageData.ATR_RustedPart.label: rusted part
LanguageData.ATR_RustedPart.description: This part has rusted. While it is not performing any noticeably worse, it is very displeasing to see, hear, and use. Repairs are needed to alleviate this.
LanguageData.ATR_PowerLoss.label: part blackout
LanguageData.ATR_PowerLoss.description: This part has suffered a near total power loss. While the part is still somewhat manipulatable by adjacent parts, it is severely impairing functionality and increasing power usage. Repairs can alleviate this, but it will pass on its own as mechanites repair the system.
LanguageData.ATR_DamagedCore.label: core damage
LanguageData.ATR_DamagedCore.description: The memory core of this unit has suffered internal physical damage and is not operating at an appropriate level. This may result in additional transitory memory corruptions and impair functionality until repaired.
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.label: failing coolant valves
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.description: The internal coolant valves of this unit are degrading. Over time, the chassis will lose the ability to circulate coolant, leading to severe impediments to repairs and cooling efficiency until repaired.
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.stages.3.label: significant
LanguageData.ATR_FailingCoolantValves.stages.4.label: severe
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.label: rogue mechanites
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.description: The internal mechanite storage has suffered a critical failure, and the mechanites are decohering and preventing coolant flow. As they accumulate in critical regions and damage coolant lines, they may cause a lethal hardware failure unless emergency repairs occur.
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.stages.0.label: high coherence
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.stages.1.label: moderate coherence
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.stages.2.label: severe coherence
LanguageData.ATR_RogueMechanites.stages.3.label: fatal
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenanceCritical.label: critical integrity
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenanceCritical.description: This unit is suffering from critically poor maintenance and may suffer spontaneous major breakdowns or many small scale failures. The lack of maintenance is also reducing overall efficiency and the chassis' ability to repair itself.
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenancePoor.label: poor integrity
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenancePoor.description: This unit is suffering from poor maintenance and may suffer spontaneous small scale failures if left unattended for too long. The lack of maintenance is slightly reducing the chassis' ability to repair itself.
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenanceSatisfactory.label: high integrity
LanguageData.ATR_MaintenanceSatisfactory.description: This unit is benefitting from proper maintenance and is immune to spontaneous part failure. The well-maintained chassis is slightly more power efficient and able to repair itself.
